title: Polymer solar cells
abstract: Recent progress in the development of polymer solar cells has improved power-conversion efficiencies from 3% to almost 9%. Based on semiconducting polymers, these solar cells are fabricated from solution-processing techniques and have unique prospects for achieving low-cost solar energy harvesting, owing to their material and manufacturing advantages. The potential applications of polymer solar cells are broad, ranging from flexible solar modules and semitransparent solar cells in windows, to building applications and even photon recycling in liquid-crystal displays. This Review covers the scientific origins and basic properties of polymer solar cell technology, material requirements and device operation mechanisms, while also providing a synopsis of major achievements in the field over the past few years. Potential future developments and the applications of this technology are also briefly discussed.
abstract_cn: 聚合物太阳能电池开发的最新进展已将功率转换效率从3％提高到了近9％。 这些太阳能电池基于半导体聚合物，采用溶液处理技术制造，由于其材料和制造优势，具有实现低成本太阳能收集的独特前景。 聚合物太阳能电池的潜在应用范围很广，从柔性太阳能电池组件和窗户中的半透明太阳能电池到建筑应用，甚至是液晶显示器中的光子回收利用。 这篇综述涵盖了聚合物太阳能电池技术的科学起源和基本特性，材料要求和设备操作机制，同时还概述了过去几年该领域的主要成就。 还简要讨论了该技术的潜在未来发展和应用。

title: The renaissance of dye-sensitized solar cells
title_cn: 染料敏化太阳能电池的复兴
abstract: Several recent major advances in the design of dyes and electrolytes for dye-sensitized solar cells have led to record power-conversion efficiencies. Donor–pi–acceptor dyes absorb much more strongly than commonly employed ruthenium-based dyes, thereby allowing most of the visible spectrum to be absorbed in thinner films. Light-trapping strategies are also improving photon absorption in thin films. New cobalt-based redox couples are making it possible to obtain higher open-circuit voltages, leading to a new record power-conversion efficiency of 12.3%. Solid-state hole conductor materials also have the potential to increase open-circuit voltages and are making dye-sensitized solar cells more manufacturable. Engineering the interface between the titania and the hole transport material is being used to reduce recombination and thus attain higher photocurrents and open-circuit voltages. The combination of these strategies promises to provide much more efficient and stable solar cells, paving the way for large-scale commercialization.
abstract_cn: 最近用于染料敏化太阳能电池的染料和电解质设计的几项重大进展已导致创纪录的功率转换效率。供体π型受体染料的吸收比通常使用的钌基染料强得多，因此可以使大部分可见光谱被更薄的薄膜吸收。捕光策略也正在改善薄膜中的光子吸收。新的钴基氧化还原电对使获得更高的开路电压成为可能，从而使功率转换效率达到了创纪录的12.3％。固态空穴导体材料还具有增加开路电压的潜力，并且使染料敏化太阳能电池的制造更加容易。对二氧化钛和空穴传输材料之间的界面进行工程设计可减少重组，从而获得更高的光电流和开路电压。这些策略的结合有望提供效率更高，更稳定的太阳能电池，从而为大规模商业化铺平道路。

title: Spectral caustics in attosecond science
title_cn: 阿秒科学中的光谱焦散
abstract: Many intriguing phenomena in nature—from phase transitions to black holes—occur at singularities. A unique type of singularity common in wave phenomena, known as caustics, links processes observed in many different branches of physics. Here, we investigate the role of caustics in attosecond science and in particular the physical process behind high harmonic generation. We experimentally demonstrate spectral focusing in high harmonic generation, showing a robust intensity enhancement of an order of magnitude over a spectral width of several harmonics. This new level of control holds promises in both scientific and technological aspects of attosecond science. Moreover, our study provides a deeper insight into the basic mechanism underlying the high harmonic generation process, revealing its quantum nature and universal properties.
abstract_cn: 自然界中许多有趣的现象都以奇异点发生，从相变到黑洞。 波动现象中常见的一种独特类型的奇点称为焦散，它链接了在物理学的许多不同分支中观察到的过程。 在这里，我们研究苛性碱在阿秒科学中的作用，尤其是高谐波产生背后的物理过程。 我们通过实验证明了在高次谐波产生中的频谱聚焦，显示了在几个谐波的频谱宽度上强度增强了一个数量级。 这种新的控制水平在原子秒科学的科学和技术方面都具有希望。 此外，我们的研究提供了对高次谐波产生过程的基本机制的更深入的了解，揭示了其量子性质和通用性质。

title: Integration of gigahertz-bandwidth semiconductor devices inside microstructured optical fibres
title_cn: 千兆赫带宽半导体器件在微结构光纤中的集成
abstract: The prospect of an all-fibre optical communications network in which light can be generated, modulated and detected within the fibre itself without the need for discrete optoelectronic devices is an appealing one. However, to become a reality, this approach requires the incorporation of optoelectronic materials and functionalities into silica fibres to create a new breed of semiconductor–fibre hybrid devices for performing various tasks. Here, we report the integration of precisely doped semiconductor materials and high-quality rectifying semiconductor junctions into microstructured optical fibres, enabling high-speed, in-fibre functionalities such as photodetection at telecommunications wavelengths. These semiconductor–fibre hybrid devices exhibit a bandwidth of up to 3 GHz and seamless coupling to standard single-mode optical fibres.
abstract_cn: 一种全光纤光通信网络的前景非常诱人，其中可以在光纤本身内生成，调制和检测光，而无需分立的光电设备。 但是，要成为现实，这种方法需要将光电子材料和功能集成到二氧化硅纤维中，以创建用于执行各种任务的新型半导体纤维混合设备。 在这里，我们报告了将精确掺杂的半导体材料和高质量的整流半导体结集成到微结构化光纤中的功能，从而实现了高速光纤内功能，例如在电信波长下进行光检测。 这些半导体光纤混合设备的带宽高达3GHz，并且可以无缝耦合到标准单模光纤。

title: Tandem polymer solar cells featuring a spectrally matched low-bandgap polymer
title_cn: 具有光谱匹配的低带隙聚合物的串联聚合物太阳能电池
abstract: Tandem solar cells provide an effective way to harvest a broader spectrum of solar radiation by combining two or more solar cells with different absorption bands. However, for polymer solar cells, the performance of tandem devices lags behind single-layer solar cells mainly due to the lack of a suitable low-bandgap polymer. Here, we demonstrate highly efficient single and tandem polymer solar cells featuring a low-bandgap conjugated polymer (PBDTT-DPP: bandgap, ∼1.44 eV). A single-layer device based on the polymer provides a power conversion efficiency of ∼6%. When the polymer is applied to tandem solar cells, a power conversion efficiency of 8.62% is achieved, which is, to the best of our knowledge, the highest certified efficiency for a polymer solar cell to date.
abstract_cn: 串联太阳能电池通过结合两个或多个具有不同吸收带的太阳能电池，提供了一种收集更广谱太阳辐射的有效方法。 然而，对于聚合物太阳能电池，串联装置的性能落后于单层太阳能电池，这主要是由于缺乏合适的低带隙聚合物。 在这里，我们展示了具有低带隙共轭聚合物（PBDTT-DPP：带隙，＆＃8764; 1.44 eV）的高效单层和串联聚合物太阳能电池。 基于聚合物的单层设备提供的功率转换效率为6％。 当将聚合物应用于串联太阳能电池时，可实现8.62％的功率转换效率，据我们所知，这是迄今为止聚合物太阳能电池获得的最高认证效率。</ p>

title: Comb-based radiofrequency photonic filters with rapid tunability and high selectivity
title_cn: 具有快速可调性和高选择性的基于梳子的射频光子滤波器
abstract: Photonic technologies have received considerable attention regarding the enhancement of radiofrequency electrical systems, including high-frequency analogue signal transmission, control of phased arrays, analog-to-digital conversion and signal processing. Although the potential of radiofrequency photonics for the implementation of tunable electrical filters over broad radiofrequency bandwidths has been much discussed, the realization of programmable filters with highly selective filter lineshapes and rapid reconfigurability has faced significant challenges. A new approach for radiofrequency photonic filters based on frequency combs offers a potential route to simultaneous high stopband attenuation, fast tunability and bandwidth reconfiguration. In one configuration, tuning of the radiofrequency passband frequency is demonstrated with unprecedented (∼40 ns) speed by controlling the optical delay between combs. In a second, fixed filter configuration, cascaded four-wave mixing simultaneously broadens and smoothes the comb spectra, resulting in Gaussian radiofrequency filter lineshapes exhibiting an extremely high (>60 dB) main lobe to sidelobe suppression ratio and (>70 dB) stopband attenuation.
abstract_cn: 在增强射频电气系统方面，光子技术已受到相当多的关注，包括高频模拟信号传输，相控阵控制，模数转换和信号处理。尽管已经讨论了在广泛的射频带宽上实现可调谐电滤波器的射频光子学潜力，但如何实现具有高度选择性的滤波器线形和快速可重构性的可编程滤波器却面临着巨大的挑战。一种基于频率梳的射频光子滤波器的新方法为同时实现高阻带衰减，快速可调性和带宽重新配置提供了一条潜在途径。在一种配置中，通过控制梳子之间的光学延迟，以前所未有的（＃8764; 40 ns）速度演示了射频通带频率的调谐。在第二个固定滤波器配置中，级联四波混频同时加宽并平滑了梳状频谱，从而导致高斯射频滤波器线形呈现出极高的（> 60 dB）主瓣对旁瓣抑制比和（> 70 dB）阻带衰减。

title: Towards high-speed imaging of infrared photons with bio-inspired nanoarchitectures
title_cn: 借助生物灵感的纳米结构实现红外光子的高速成像
abstract: Existing infrared detectors rely on complex microfabrication and thermal management methods. Here, we report an attractive platform of low-thermal-mass resonators inspired by the architectures of iridescent Morpho butterfly scales. In these resonators, the optical cavity is modulated by its thermal expansion and refractive index change, resulting in ‘wavelength conversion’ of mid-wave infrared (3–8 µm) radiation into visible iridescence changes. By doping Morpho butterfly scales with single-walled carbon nanotubes, we achieved mid-wave infrared detection with 18–62 mK temperature sensitivity and 35–40 Hz heat-sink-free response speed. The nanoscale pitch and the extremely small thermal mass of individual ‘pixels’ promise significant improvements over existing detectors. Computational analysis explains the origin of this thermal response and guides future conceptually new bio-inspired thermal imaging sensor designs.
abstract_cn: 现有的红外探测器依靠复杂的微细加工和热管理方法。 在这里，我们报告了一个诱人的低热质量谐振器平台，该平台受到了虹彩Morpho蝴蝶秤的启发。 在这些谐振器中，光腔是通过其热膨胀和折射率变化来调制的，从而导致“波长转换”。 中波红外（3＆＃8211; 8＆＃160;＆＃181; m）辐射转变为可见的虹彩变化。 通过用单壁碳纳米管掺杂Morpho蝴蝶秤，我们实现了中波红外检测，具有18＆＃8211; 62＆＃160; mK温度敏感度和35＆＃8211; 40无散热器的响应速度。 单个像素的纳米级间距和极小的热质量。 有望比现有的探测器有重大改进。 计算分析解释了这种热响应的起源，并指导了未来概念上新的，受生物启发的热成像传感器设计。
